body_content.explanation: used to describe an honest and direct conversation between two men:
examples: They are really having to face the issue man to man.

body_content.explanation: in team sports, used to describe a system in which defending players mark a particular player from the opposing team (= stay close to them to try to stop them getting control of the ball):
examples: Their cornerbacks will be asked to provide plenty of man-to-man coverage.
He installed a classic man-to-man defense.
He is one of the best man to man markers in the game.
The Germans opted for man-for-man marking, cancelling out the individual influence of the better French players.
If you try to mark man-for-man, you have your players running all over the field.
He cannot be marked man for man because their frontline is switching constantly.
